
set (DCMTK_OFSTD_SRC 
  ofstd/ofcmdln.cc   
  ofstd/ofconfig.cc  
  ofstd/ofdate.cc    
  ofstd/oflist.cc    
  ofstd/ofstring.cc
  ofstd/ofconapp.cc  
  ofstd/ofconsol.cc  
  ofstd/ofdatime.cc  
  ofstd/oflogfil.cc  
  ofstd/ofthread.cc
  ofstd/ofcond.cc    
  ofstd/ofcrc32.cc   
  ofstd/offname.cc   
  ofstd/ofstd.cc
  ofstd/oftime.cc
)

set (DCMTK_DCMDATA_SRC
  dcmdata/cmdlnarg.cc  
  dcmdata/dcerror.cc   
  dcmdata/dcostrmz.cc  
  dcmdata/dctag.cc     
  dcmdata/dcvrfl.cc    
  dcmdata/dcvrul.cc
  dcmdata/dcbytstr.cc  
  dcmdata/dcfilefo.cc  
  dcmdata/dcpcache.cc  
  dcmdata/dctagkey.cc  
  dcmdata/dcvris.cc    
  dcmdata/dcvrulup.cc
  dcmdata/dcchrstr.cc  
  dcmdata/dchashdi.cc  
  dcmdata/dcpixel.cc   
  dcmdata/dctypes.cc   
  dcmdata/dcvrlo.cc    
  dcmdata/dcvrus.cc
  dcmdata/dccodec.cc   
  dcmdata/dcistrma.cc  
  dcmdata/dcpixseq.cc  
  dcmdata/dcuid.cc     
  dcmdata/dcvrlt.cc    
  dcmdata/dcvrut.cc
  dcmdata/dcdatset.cc  
  dcmdata/dcistrmb.cc  
  dcmdata/dcpxitem.cc  
  dcmdata/dcvm.cc      
  dcmdata/dcvrobow.cc  
  dcmdata/dcxfer.cc
  dcmdata/dcddirif.cc  
  dcmdata/dcistrmf.cc  
  dcmdata/dcrleccd.cc  
  dcmdata/dcvrae.cc    
  dcmdata/dcvrof.cc
  dcmdata/dcdebug.cc   
  dcmdata/dcistrmz.cc 
  dcmdata/dcrlecce.cc  
  dcmdata/dcvras.cc    
  dcmdata/dcvrpn.cc    
  dcmdata/dcdicdir.cc  
  dcmdata/dcitem.cc    
  dcmdata/dcrlecp.cc   
  dcmdata/dcvrat.cc    
  dcmdata/dcvrpobw.cc  
  dcmdata/dcdicent.cc  
  dcmdata/dclist.cc    
  dcmdata/dcrledrg.cc  
  dcmdata/dcvr.cc      
  dcmdata/dcvrsh.cc    
  dcmdata/dcdictbi.cc  
  dcmdata/dcmetinf.cc  
  dcmdata/dcrleerg.cc  
  dcmdata/dcvrcs.cc    
  dcmdata/dcvrsl.cc
  dcmdata/dcdict.cc    
  dcmdata/dcobject.cc  
  dcmdata/dcrlerp.cc   
  dcmdata/dcvrda.cc    
  dcmdata/dcvrss.cc
  dcmdata/dcostrma.cc  
  dcmdata/dcsequen.cc  
  dcmdata/dcvrds.cc    
  dcmdata/dcvrst.cc
  dcmdata/dcdirrec.cc  
  dcmdata/dcostrmb.cc  
  dcmdata/dcstack.cc   
  dcmdata/dcvrdt.cc    
  dcmdata/dcvrtm.cc
  dcmdata/dcelem.cc    
  dcmdata/dcostrmf.cc  
  dcmdata/dcswap.cc    
  dcmdata/dcvrfd.cc    
  dcmdata/dcvrui.cc
)


set ( DCMTK_VURTIGO_SRC
  Vurtigo/DICOMFileReader.cpp
  Vurtigo/DICOMImageData.cpp
)

add_library(DCMTKVurtigo SHARED 
  ${DCMTK_OFSTD_SRC} 
  ${DCMTK_DCMDATA_SRC} 
  ${DCMTK_VURTIGO_SRC}
)
target_link_libraries (DCMTKVurtigo
  ${QT_LIBRARIES}
  vtkFiltering
  vtkCommon
  vtkRendering
)
